fairy.name: Aromatic Mist
fairy.effect: Raises an ally's Special Defense by 1.

fairy.name: Baby-Doll Eyes
fairy.effect: Priority. Lowers the target's Strength by 1.

fairy.name: Charm
fairy.effect: Lowers the target's Strength by 2.

fairy.name: Crafty Shield
fairy.effect: Priority. Protects the user and its allies from status moves for one turn.

fairy.name: Dazzling Gleam
fairy.effect: Hits all adjacent opponents.

fairy.name: Decorate
fairy.effect: Raises the target's Strength and Special by 2.

fairy.name: Disarming Voice
fairy.effect: This move never misses.

fairy.name: Draining Kiss
fairy.effect: The user recovers HP equal to 75% of the damage dealt.

fairy.name: Fairy Lock
fairy.effect: No Pokémon can switch out on the next turn.

fairy.name: Fairy Wind
fairy.effect: None.

fairy.name: Fleur Cannon
fairy.effect: Lowers the user's Special by 2 after use.

fairy.name: Flower Shield
fairy.effect: Raises the Defense of all Grass-type Pokémon on the field by 1.

fairy.name: Geomancy
fairy.effect: The user charges for one turn, then raises its Special, Special Defense, and Dexterity by 2.

fairy.name: Light of Ruin
fairy.effect: The user takes recoil damage equal to half the damage dealt.

fairy.name: Magical Torque
fairy.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target is Confused.

fairy.name: Misty Explosion
fairy.effect: The user faints. Hits all adjacent Pokémon. Damage is boosted by 1.5x if used on Misty Terrain.

fairy.name: Misty Terrain
fairy.effect: Creates a Misty Terrain for 5 rounds. Pokémon on the ground are protected from status conditions and Dragon-type moves are weakened.

fairy.name: Moonblast
fairy.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target's Special is lowered by 1.

fairy.name: Moonlight
fairy.effect: The user recovers HP. Amount depends on the weather.

fairy.name: Nature's Madness
fairy.effect: Reduces the target's current HP by half.

fairy.name: Play Rough
fairy.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target's Strength is lowered by 1.

fairy.name: Sparkly Swirl
fairy.effect: Cures all status ailments on the user's team.

fairy.name: Spirit Break
fairy.effect: Lowers the target's Special by 1.

fairy.name: Strange Steam
fairy.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target is Confused.

fairy.name: Sweet Kiss
fairy.effect: Confuses the target.

fighting.name: Arm Thrust
fighting.effect: This move hits 2 to 5 times.

fighting.name: Aura Sphere
fighting.effect: This move never misses.

fighting.name: Axe Kick
fighting.effect: If this move misses, the user takes damage equal to half of its max HP. Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target is Confused.

fighting.name: Body Press
fighting.effect: Uses the user's Defense stat to calculate damage instead of Strength.

fighting.name: Brick Break
fighting.effect: Destroys Reflect and Light Screen.

fighting.name: Bulk Up
fighting.effect: The user's Strength and Defense are raised by 1.

fighting.name: Circle Throw

fighting.name: Close Combat
fighting.effect: The user's Defense and Special Defense are lowered by 1.

fighting.name: Coaching
fighting.effect: Raises an ally's Strength and Defense by 1.

fighting.name: Counter
fighting.effect: Priority (goes last). If hit by a physical attack, the user deals double the damage taken.

fighting.name: Cross Chop
fighting.effect: High Critical Hit Ratio. Low Accuracy.

fighting.name: Detect
fighting.effect: Priority. Protects the user from all attacks.

fighting.name: Double Kick
fighting.effect: This move hits twice.

fighting.name: Drain Punch
fighting.effect: The user recovers HP equal to half the damage dealt.

fighting.name: Dynamic Punch
fighting.effect: Confuses the target. Very Low Accuracy.

fighting.name: Final Gambit
fighting.effect: The user faints. The target takes damage equal to the user's remaining HP.

fighting.name: Flying Press
fighting.effect: This move deals both Fighting and Flying type damage.

fighting.name: Focus Blast
fighting.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target's Special Defense is lowered by 1. Low Accuracy.

fighting.name: Focus Punch
fighting.effect: The user focuses at the beginning of the round. If hit before it can attack, it flinches.

fighting.name: Force Palm
fighting.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target is Paralyzed.

fighting.name: Hammer Arm
fighting.effect: The user's Dexterity is lowered by 1.

fighting.name: High Jump Kick
fighting.effect: If this move misses, the user takes damage equal to half of its max HP.

fighting.name: Jump Kick
fighting.effect: If this move misses, the user takes damage equal to half of its max HP.

fighting.effect: High Critical Hit Ratio.

fighting.name: Low Kick
fighting.effect: Damage increases based on the target's weight.

fighting.name: Low Sweep
fighting.effect: Lowers the target's Dexterity by 1.

fighting.name: Mach Punch
fighting.effect: Priority.

fighting.name: Mat Block
fighting.effect: Priority. Protects the user and its allies from damaging moves for one turn. Fails if not used on the first turn.

fighting.name: Meteor Assault
fighting.effect: The user must recharge on the next turn.

fighting.name: No Retreat
fighting.effect: Raises all of the user's stats by 1, but the user cannot switch out.

fighting.name: Power-Up Punch
fighting.effect: Raises the user's Strength by 1.

fighting.name: Quick Guard
fighting.effect: Priority. Protects the user and its allies from priority moves for one turn.

fighting.name: Revenge
fighting.effect: If the user was damaged this round, this move's damage is doubled.

fighting.name: Reversal
fighting.effect: Damage increases the lower the user's HP is.

fighting.name: Rock Smash
fighting.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target's Defense is lowered by 1.

fighting.name: Rolling Kick
fighting.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target Flinches.

fighting.name: Sacred Sword
fighting.effect: Ignores the target's Defense and Evasion boosts.

fighting.name: Secret Sword
fighting.effect: This move deals physical damage, using the user's Special stat and the target's Defense stat.

fighting.name: Seismic Toss
fighting.effect: This move always deals damage equal to the user's level (or Rank * 10).

fighting.name: Sky Uppercut
fighting.effect: Can hit Pokémon in the air.

fighting.name: Storm Throw
fighting.effect: This move is always a critical hit.

fighting.name: Submission
fighting.effect: The user takes recoil damage equal to 1/4 of the damage dealt.

fighting.name: Superpower
fighting.effect: The user's Strength and Defense are lowered by 1.

fighting.name: Thunderous Kick
fighting.effect: Lowers the target's Defense by 1.

fighting.name: Victory Dance

fighting.name: Vital Throw
fighting.effect: This move never misses, but the user acts last.

fighting.name: Wake-Up Slap
fighting.effect: If the target is asleep, this move's damage is doubled, but the target is woken up.

flying.effect: High Critical Hit Ratio.

flying.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target Flinches.

flying.name: Beak Blast
flying.effect: The user heats its beak at the start of the round. If hit by a contact move, the attacker is Burned.

flying.name: Bleakwind Storm
flying.effect: Hits all adjacent opponents. Roll 1d6. On a 6, lowers their Dexterity by 1. Boosted accuracy in rain.

flying.effect: The user takes recoil damage equal to 1/3 of the damage dealt.

flying.name: Chatter
flying.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target is Confused.

flying.effect: None.

flying.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target Flinches.

flying.name: Hurricane
flying.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target is Confused. Can hit Pokémon in the air. 100% accuracy in rain.

flying.effect: The user recovers HP equal to 75% of the damage dealt.

flying.effect: None.

flying.name: Sky Attack
flying.effect: The user charges for one turn, then attacks. High Critical Hit Ratio. Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target Flinches.
